name: Choice of Action Prison Break
description:
You have to choose the right actions to escape from prison. Your future in the game depends on the choice of actions. You will play the character Stickman, who must escape from the dungeon in the castle. Include your logic, and attentiveness, because this will determine the correctness of the choice of your solution.
The game has 2 variants of the plot of a successful jailbreak and 18 unsuccessful scenes of jailbreak. Find all the ways to escape from this castle! Beautiful graphics, funny animation, funny moments will cheer you up. Character Stick does not want to be in prison, so you need to take action that will lead to victory.
On the way you are waiting for various difficulties, namely armed guards with whom you will have to fight and arrange firefights. Sometimes you will need to be smart to go through different locations. You will need to go through various traps, obstacles and even defeat the robot! Good luck to you escape!
